title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design. An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When entering an invalid date/time string in the report design interface, the system accepts and stores the value without validation.
EB: The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model before storing in the report design.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Navigate to the report design interface.
2. Enter an invalid date/time string in the date field.
3. Save the report design.
4. Confirm that the invalid date/time value was stored without any validation.
